title: Uncivil Seasons
description: With striking humor and a rich range of characters, Malone creates a landscape struggling the New South's high-tech lifestyles and the Old South's inherited codes.The Polite Piedmont town of Hillston, North Carolina, wants to go on believing it is too temperate to require homicide experts. So begins the plot of Uncivil Seasons an unforgettable novel from Michael Malone.
author: Michael Malone
